submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        pdfs = []
        cnt = Counter()
        mv = -inf
        dif = [0] * (k+3)
        for i in range(n//2):
            a,b = nums[i],nums[n-i-1]
            od = max(a,b,k-a,k-b)
            dif[od+1] += 1
            
            df = abs(a-b)
            cnt[df] += 1
        # shd = min(pdfs)
        
        tmp = 0
        for v in range(k+1):
            tmp += dif[v]
            val = cnt[v] - tmp
            if val > mv:
                mv = val
        # if cnt[df] > mv:
        #     mv = cnt[df]
        return n//2-mv
